caption.p: ( A) Map of the Ganges watershed with the RivDIS locations, the registered outbreaks included in the dataset and the river network. Maps © www.thunderforest.com, Data © www.osm.org/copyright. ( B) The blue line represents the monthly average values of the flow of the Ganges River (m 3/s) registered in RivDIS stations. Red dots stand for the number of outbreaks recorded from 1980 until 2017 in the watershed area. The variables are negatively correlated (r = −0.77, p = 0.004).
